bwwExcerpt: "Why bring back "La Cage aux Folles" -- a major hit musical of the  1983-84 Broadway season, but certainly not a classic like "Gypsy" or  "Fiddler on the Roof" -- only five years after its first Broadway  revival? Especially when that 2004-05 stint proved a tired and  unnecessary affair, suggesting that the original production (with its  six Tony Awards) was stronger than the material.
